about.p1: Hi! I am Sara Alite Villodre and I am a Junior Front End Developer.
about.p2: I studied Translation and Interpreting. My first foreign language is English, the second is French and my native language is Spanish. I also have studied a bit of Romanian and Spanish sign language too!
about.p3: I love all sort of languages, tech languages too! That's why I decided to start learning how to code. After following a Python course and attending a few tech conferences I decided to become a developer. Yay!
about.p4: I studied a front end bootcamp and I fell in love (even more) with tech. You can take a look at some of the projects I did during this course in the section 'Projects'.
about.p5: When the bootcamp finished I continued learning on my own. Now, I am following online courses to be better every day!
about.p6: When I am not coding you can find me reading about Psychology, History or Phylosophy, translating for fun, watching good horror films, wandering around the city or the nature, doing handcrafts or cooking.
